## Lab 8: Mediation

You will be reproducing the results presented in the following research paper:

Cho, C., Yoo, H. J., Min, J., Nashiro, K., Thayer, J. F., Lehrer, P. M., & Mather, M. (2023). Changes in Medial Prefrontal Cortex Mediate Effects of Heart Rate Variability Biofeedback on Positive Emotional Memory Biases. Applied Psychophysiology and Biofeedback. [**https://doi.org/10.1007/s10484-023-09579-1**](https://doi.org/10.1007/s10484-023-09579-1)

During this lab, you will gain experience performing mediation in R and assessing open science practices by attempting to replicate the findings of a recent paper.

To access Lab 8, please [click here](https://classroom.github.com/a/VCMt_gl9).
